column4: hey, I downloaded VirtualBox from http://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads -- I just got the Edgy version (but am running 15/04 daily build of Feisty) Install ran smoothly until the liscence screen came up.. I can't figure out where to press OK or accept, there is an OK text at the bottom but not clickable nor can I press enter on it. Have tried typing YES and Y... any ideas?
if its going off the screen you might be able to move the window by pressing ALT and dragging the window with the mouse
its not going off screen, it's inside of the "Terminal" window of package installer
